option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
### Quick Start ```bash # Install dependencies mvn clean install
# Run all tests mvn test
# Run specific feature tests mvn test -Dtest=LoginTestRunner mvn test -Dtest=ProductDetailsTestRunner ```
### Test Execution Options ```bash # Run tests by tags mvn test -Dcucumber.filter.tags="@smoke" mvn test -Dcucumber.filter.tags="@login and @positive" mvn test -Dcucumber.filter.tags="@products" ```
## Test Coverage
### Login Functionality - ✅ Valid login flow - ✅ Invalid credentials - ✅ Empty field validation - ✅ Error message verification
### Product Interaction - ✅ Product listing verification - ✅ Product detail viewing - ✅ Product customization (color, quantity) - ✅ Add to cart functionality - ✅ Navigation workflows
## Configuration
### Device Settings Update in `TestData.java`: ```java public static final String DEVICE_NAME = "Your_Device_Name"; ```
### App Settings All app configurations centralized in `TestData.java`: - App package and activity - APK path - Appium server URL - Timeout values
## Final Project Structure ``` src/test/java/com/saucelabs/mydemoapp/android/ ├── base/ │ └── BaseDriver.java ├── data/ │ └── TestData.java ├── pages/ │ ├── LoginPage.java │ ├── ProductsPage.java │ └── ProductDetailsPage.java ├── runner/ │ ├── TestRunner.java │ ├── LoginTestRunner.java │ └── ProductDetailsTestRunner.java ├── stepdefs/ │ ├── LoginStep.java │ └── ProductDetailsStep.java └── utils/ └── AppiumUtils.java
src/test/resources/ ├── builds/ │ └── mda-1.0.13-15.apk └── features/ ├── login.feature └── product_details.feature ```
## ✨ Key Benefits Achieved
1. **Maintainability**: Modular design makes updates easier 2. **Scalability**: Easy to add new page objects and test scenarios 3. **Reusability**: Common utilities and base classes 4. **Reliability**: Proper wait strategies and error handling 5. **Readability**: Clean, well-documented code structure 6. **Flexibility**: Tag-based test execution and multiple runners
## Ready for Production
The refactored framework is now: - ✅ **Compilation-tested** and error-free - ✅ **Compatible** with JDK 8 and modern Android devices - ✅ **Documented** with comprehensive README - ✅ **Organized** with proper project structure - ✅ **Extensible** for future test scenarios - ✅ **Production-ready** for CI/CD integration
The framework successfully demonstrates automated testing of the SauceLabs Demo App with comprehensive product details viewing functionality and robust login testing capabilities.

option.name: updatedContent
